description: This file defines a React functional component named 'NoteCard' which represents a stylized note card UI element. It includes type definitions for props and enums for size and background variants, along with accessibility features and event handling.

methods.name: NoteCard
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a stylized note card with customizable size, background, and click handling.

methods.name: handleKeyDown
methods.description: Handles key down events for accessibility, invokes 'onClick' on Enter or Space keys.
